Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLScrollView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ScrollView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLScrollView
class SLScrollView
extends ScrollView
Subclass of ScrollView that applies the stone-texture look. SLScrollGroup uses these by default, so if you're using an SLScrollGroup you don't need to worry about modifying the appearance further.
See Also:
SLScrollGroup

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
